string.text: This document is encrypted. View content is possible only after decryption.
This document is encrypted. View content is possible only after decryption.

The location of the facilities of the closed laboratory complex for the development of our advanced warfare weapons has been changed. As a result of additional arrangements, all of them have been removed to the Valley of Shadows for further deployment. The information in the available documents can only be deciphered after a visit to the main laboratory in the Valley of Shadows.
Viewing the skill Fundamentals of Hunting
On startup, an automatic microwave radiation measurement will be performed.
Automatic gamma ray measurement will be made at launch.
Cuts off tail of blind dog
Cut off the tail of a Chernobyl
The eye of the giant cut out
Trophy catching is not possible, no special skill is available.
Trophy catching is not possible, and you are missing a hunting knife.
Trophy cannot be taken, unknown mutant type.
Damage - 55; Rate of fire - 350; Sight range - 200.
Damage - 105; Rate of fire - 100; Sight range - 1500.
Bulletproof-35; Protection against anomalies-40; Protection against radiation-40.
Damage- 50; Rate of fire- 150; Sight range- 150.
Damage - 45; Rate of fire - 800; Sight range - 1000.
Bulletproof - 45; Protection from anomalies - 40; Protection from radiation - 40.
Damage 60; Rate of fire 120; Sight range 180.
Damage - 55; Rate of fire - 750; Sight range - 800.
Bulletproof - 55; Protection against anomalies - 50; Protection against radiation - 40.
Psi radiation will be measured at launch.
Gamma and beta radiation will be measured at launch.
There is no information for learning the skill of selecting a certain artefact. The selector needs a data flash card.
Learning how to calibrate the anomaly detector.
Learning how to calibrate the artifact detector.
Learning how to calibrate the bioradar detector.
Level 1. Detecting hidden stalker's hiding places. Possibility to investigate the area more thoroughly for hard to find geocaches.
Level 2. Apprentice thief. Opportunity to steal while talking to inexperienced interlocutors. The amount of theft is 100 rubles.
Level 3. Skilled Thief. Opportunity to steal from conversations with regular conversation partners. The amount of theft is 200 rubles. In addition to money, an item can be stolen.
4th level. Master Thief. The opportunity to carry out a major theft. The sum of the theft is 300 rubles. In addition to money, an artifact can be stolen.
Level 5. Attention skill. This skill allows you to protect yourself from pickpocketing while talking to stalkers.
Learn the skill of detecting hidden stalker caches. The cost is 1000 rub.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rub) you will learn the ability to steal at the entry level.
For a certain amount of money (2,500 RUB), you will learn how to perform a medium-level theft.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUR), you will learn how to perform a high-level theft.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.) you will learn how to be protected from theft.
1st level. First aid. You can give elementary, but top-quality first aid to the wounded.
2nd level. Healing at the Basic level of the Disciple skill. Capable of treating lacerations caused by mutant attacks.
Level 3. Healing at intermediate skill level Skilled Physician. Can perform the necessary treatment of different burns and thermal injuries up to the maximum severity.
Level 4. Healing at the highest skill level of the Field Doctor. Capable of providing the necessary treatment for all types and degrees of CBRN injuries.
Level 5. The maximum level of the Field Surgeon skill. This skill allows to perform treatment of gunshot wounds received on a battlefield.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rubles) you will learn how to administer first aid.
For a certain amount of money (2500 RUR), you will learn to perform entry-level healings.
For a certain amount of money (RUR 2,500), you will learn how to perform Intermediate Level Healing.
For a certain amount of money (5,000 RUB), you will receive training on how to perform an advanced-level heal.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.), a maximum level heal will be studied.
1st level. Warming food on the fire. It is possible to warm up food from the army pack on the campfire.
2nd level. Effective use of armour. You can make the necessary correct application of unknown equipment to ensure the reduction of damage to the body.
3rd level. Working with anomaly detectors. Capable of making a proper choice of found artifacts to avoid the harmful effects on your body.
4th level. Handling artifact containers. The ability to store the artifacts intelligently in the backpack once they are found.
Level 5. Work with advanced equipment. This skill allows to carry out further competent training for the chosen specialization.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rub.) the ability to provide first aid will be studied.
For the same amount of money (2500 rub.), you will learn how to administer basic level medicine.
For a certain amount of money (RUR 2,500), you will learn how to perform intermediate level Healing.
For a certain amount of money (5,000 RUB), you will receive a training on how to perform an advanced-level heal.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.), a maximum level heal will be studied.
1st level. Radio electronic suppression. Study of principles and basis of radio electronic suppression, which is achieved by creation of active and passive jamming, use of decoys, traps.

Level 2. Radio electronic defence. Study of the principles and fundamentals of radio-electronic protection designed to ensure stable operation of the RPS under conditions of intentional radio interference.

Level 3. Radio electronic reconnaissance. A study of the principles and fundamentals of electronic reconnaissance, which consists of collecting information based on the reception and analysis of electromagnetic radiation.
Level 4. Comprehensive technical control. Controlling the state of operation of their radio electronic facilities and their protection from enemy technical reconnaissance facilities.
Level 5. Electromagnetic defeat. This skill allows one to conduct electromagnetic defeat by inducing induction currents with the help of special equipment.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rubles) the basics of electromagnetic suppression will be learned.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rubles) the basics of electronic protection will be studied.
For a certain amount of money (RUR 2,500) the basics of electronic reconnaissance will be studied.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUR) the basics of complex technical control will be studied.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rubles) the basics of electromagnetic defence will be studied.
Level 1. Detection of Gravity type anomalies. Possibility to get the settings of the device to detect anomalies of this type.
2nd level. Detection of a Psi Zone type anomaly. Possibility to get an anomaly detection setting for this type of anomalies.
Level 3. Detection of anomalies of the Thermal anomaly type. Possibility to obtain an anomaly detection setting for this type of anomalies.
Level 4. Detection of a Chemical type anomaly. It is possible to receive an anomaly detection setting for this anomaly type.
Level 5. Electrostatic anomaly detection. Possibility to get an anomaly detector settings for this type of anomalies.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rubles), it will be possible to obtain the settings for the device to detect Gravitational type anomalies.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rubles), I will study the possibility of obtaining settings for the device to detect anomalies of the Psi Zone type.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rubles), I will study the possibility of obtaining settings for the device to detect anomalies of the Thermal type.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rubles), it will be possible to get the settings for the device to detect anomalies of the Chemical type.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.), you will learn how to configure the Electrostatic Anomaly Detector.
Level 1. Detection of Gravitational type artifacts. Possibility to get an appliance tuned to detect this type of artefact.
Level 2. Detecting Chemical type artifacts. Possibility to get an artifact detector setting for this type of artifact.
Level 3. Detects artifacts of the Thermal type. Opportunity to acquire an artifact detection setting for this type of artifact.
Level 4. Electrostatic artifact detection. Acquire the ability to configure an appliance to detect this type of artifact.
Level 5. Detect artifacts of type Special. Option to acquire a similar type of Artifact Detection Tool settings.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rub.) you will be able to get settings for the appliance to detect this type of artifact.
For a certain amount of money (2500 RUR) you will be asked to configure a tool to detect Chemical type artefacts.
For a certain amount of money (2500 RUR) you will be asked to configure a tool to detect artifacts such as Thermal.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUR), you will be asked to configure a tool to detect ElectroStatic type artifacts.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RMB) you will be asked to configure a tool to detect Special type artifacts.
Level 1. Detection of type 1 bio-organisms. Possibility to get instrument settings for detection of this type of bio-organisms.
Level 2. Detection of type 2 organisms. Ability to obtain instrument settings for detection of similar type of bio-organisms.
Level 3. Detection of Bio-Organisms of the 3rd level. Ability to obtain instrument settings for detection of similar organism type.
Level 4. Detection of Bio-Organism Level 4. Level 4 Detection of similar organism types.
Level 5. Detection of Bio-Organism Level 5. You can get settings of the device for detection of this type of bio-organisms.
For a certain sum of money (1000 rub.) you will be able to get settings of the device for detection of the 1st type of bioorganisms.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rub.) it will be possible to study getting the settings for the device for detection of the 2nd type bioorganisms.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rubles) it will be studied to get the settings for the device for detection of the 3rd type bioorganisms.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rubles) it will be studied to get the settings for the device for detection of the 4th type bio-organisms.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.) it will be studied to get the settings for the device for detection of the 5th type of bioorganisms.
For a certain sum of money (1000 rub.) you will learn how to cut off valuable parts from a mutant Blind Dog.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rub.) you will be paid to examine the possibility of cutting off valuable parts from mutant Chernobyl.
For a certain amount of money (2,500 RUR), you will be charged to research the ability to cut off valuable parts from the Flesh mutant.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUR), you will be charged to research the ability to cut off valuable parts from the mutant Wild Boar.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUR), you will be charged to examine the ability to cut off valuable parts from the mutant Snork.
1st level. Working with the mutant Blind Dog. You can learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable carcass parts.
2nd level. Working with the mutant Chernobyl. Ability to learn the skill of correctly retrieving valuable parts of the carcass.
3rd level. Working with the Flesh mutant. Ability to learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable carcass parts.
4th level. Works with the mutant boar. Ability to learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable carcass parts.
5th level. Work with the mutant Snork. Ability to learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable parts of the carcass.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rub) you will learn the ability to cut valuable carcass parts from the mutant Bloodsucker.
For a certain amount of money (2500 RUR), you will learn how to cut off valuable parts from a Burer mutant.
For a certain amount of money (2,500 RUR), you will be charged to examine the possibility of cutting off valuable parts from the Controller mutant.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUR), you will be charged to research the mutant Chimera for the removal of its valuable parts.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUR), you will be required to learn how to cut off parts from the Giant mutant.
Level 6. Work with the mutant Bloodsucker. Opportunity to learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable carcass parts.
7th level. Working with the mutant Burer. Ability to learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable carcass parts.
8th level. Working with the mutant Controller. Ability to learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable parts of the carcass.
9th level. Works with the Chimera mutant. Ability to learn the skill of correctly extracting valuable parts of the carcass.
10th level. Work with the mutant Giant. Ability to learn the skill of proper extraction of valuable carcass parts.
Upgrade the skill of working with weapon repair kits.
Upgrading the skill of working with the equipment repair kit.
Mastering the skill of working with mechanical devices and electronics.
Upgrading the skill of working with chemical and biological reagents.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rub.) you will get the ability to work with organic poisons.
For a certain amount of money (2500 RUB), you will get the ability to work with reagents to create flares.
For a certain amount of money (2500 RUB), you will be given an opportunity to work with reagents for creation of explosive devices.
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUB), you will be given the opportunity to work with chemical warfare agents.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.) you will be given an opportunity to work with neuropsychotropic substances.
1st level. Work with organic poisons. Possibility to synthesize poisons like ricin, aconitine, botulinotoxin, arsenic, and snake venom.
Level 2. Work with chemicals like phosphorus to create flares.
Level 3. Working with compounds like TNT, nitroglycerine, napalm to create explosive and incendiary mixtures.
Level 4. Works with CWAs such as iprtite, zorin, soman, vi-ex, hydrocyanic acid, sulphurous anhydride.
Level 5. General skill in handling psychotropic agents such as ethylmercaptan, formaldehyde.
For a certain amount of money (1000 rubles) will be given the ability to work with soldering machines.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rubles) you will be able to work with radio equipment.
For a certain amount of money (2500 rubles) you will be able to work with explosive devices.
For a certain amount of money (5000 roubles), you will be able to pick electronic locks.
For a certain amount of money (5000 rubles) will be obtained the basic skill of hacking.
Level 1. Working with soldering machines. Ability to solder microchips.
2nd level. Work with radiodevices like high-frequency radios, oscilloscopes, spectrum analyzers.
Level 3. Working with various explosive devices. Radio-controlled mines, land mines, stretch bombs - their detection and disarming.
4th level. Cracking electronic locks. Ability to select the necessary equipment.
5th level. Basic hacking skills for cracking passwords and firmware of electronic devices.
For the certain sum of money (1000 rub.) you'll be able to repair all the equipment of the 1st level (greasing and cleaning of the main mechanisms).
For a certain amount of money (2500 rub.), you will be able to repair basic Level 1 equipment (armour plate repair and riveting).
For a certain amount of money (2,500 RUB), you can repair additional Level 1 equipment (general repair).
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.) you can repair level 2 basic equipment (defence systems repair).
For a certain amount of money (5000 RUB), you can repair additional Level 2 equipment (protective system repair).
For a certain amount of money (1000 rub.) you can grease and clean weapons.
For a certain amount of money (2500 RUR), you can repair 1st level main weapon (trigger mechanism repair).
For a certain amount of money (2500 rub.), you will be able to repair an additional Level 1 weapon (trigger mechanism repair).
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.), you can repair a Level 2 main weapon (basic repair).
For a certain amount of money (5000 rub.) you can repair 2nd level additional weapon (basic repair).
Level 1. Cleaning with ramrod and dustpan. Oil lubrication.
Level 2. Repair of firing mechanism of main gun types.
Level 3. Level 3: Repair of firing mechanisms of additional weapon types.
4th level. General repair of firing mechanisms of major weapon types.
Level 5. General repair of mechanisms of additional weapon types.
2nd level. Repair of armor plates of basic equipment types.
3rd level. Repair of armour plates for additional gear types.
4th level. General repair of the protective mechanism of the main types of equipment.
5th level. General repair of safety mechanisms of additional equipment types.
If you have the required data, you can select the Bracelet artifact.
Selective Dementor artifact will be available, subject to availability of certain data.
If you have the correct data, you can also select the Sponge artifact.
Heavenly Apple artifact selection is available, subject to availability.
Selecting the Bell artifact will be available, subject to availability of certain data.
Scale: Rin - 3 megohms, Svx - 30 pF; k-not of X - 30 mV/del, k-not of Y - 60 ms/del
Scale: Rin - 3 Mohm, Svx - 30 pF; X- N - 30 mV/del, Y- N - 60 ms/del.
Scale: Rin - 3 megohms, Svx - 30 pF; kt-period X - 48 mV/del, kt-period Y - 65 ms/del.
The selection type is set. The operation is successfully completed.

Description of the first step. Calibration. A window of the same name will open on clicking the button, and a certain sequence of operations will be carried out. You are to enter numerical values (amplitude and frequency) for the reference video pulse as part of the calibration procedure. The data is entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the calibration window.

Description of the second action. Spectral analysis. Click the button to open the window with the same name. During operation of scaling you should enter numerical values of coefficient parameters on X and Y axes. The data will be entered in special fields. The values themselves will be shown in the spectral analysis window.
Description of the third step. Selection. Click the button to open the window of the same name in which you need to select the selection type and the main amplification factor.
To buy (sell) a selected item. You may buy (sell) a maximum of 5 items at a time.
You do not have enough items to complete the Sell operation.
You do not have enough money to complete the transaction.
Description of the first aid kit.
Contents of the first aid kit:
In a plastic-coated aluminium case, dimensions 52.6 x 40 x 17 cm, contains compartments for accessories and 26 ampoule compartments. For use when emergency resuscitation procedures are required.

Optional ampoule rack for 10 ampoules, OXYWAY oxygen supply system, including: oxygen cylinder 0.8 l with reducer with oxygen supply speed 4 l/min, breathing hose 200 cm, angled connector, Straps to fix the oxygen cylinder, Manual ventilator (Ambu bag), COMBIBAG universal for adults and children, may be autoclaved,
inflatable rubber breathing mask 
Oropharyngeal airway Nasopharyngeal airway
Mechanical suction MANUVAC
Aspiration catheters sterile, 50cm.
The device performs diagnostics and provides automatic emergency medical assistance. Furthermore, a variety of different stimulators may be used.

The new first aid kit contains a full range of medicines required for public protection. The new first aid kit is designed to provide first aid, prevent or mitigate the effects of radioactive substances (RW), bacterial agents (BS), organophosphorus agents (OPA) and toxic substances (ACh). The AI-4 is equipped with modern, more effective pharmaceuticals. In general, AI-4 first-aid kit corresponds to the realities of today and can be successfully and efficiently used both for placing it in reserve, and for equipping of operating rescue units. It looks like a bright orange plastic box, size 9cm ? 10cm ? 2 cm with the inscription "Individual first aid kit", a cross inside the circle and projections for holding. Contains medicine boxes, medication boxes and instructions. Supplied in polyethylene bag with product and manufacturer's information.
When the button is pressed, the current DHT status will be diagnosed on five basic parameters and an additional selection of preparations will be added.

If the button is pressed, the medical module will carry out the treatment of DHT, with the possible use of additional Vital Signalling Stimulants. If you choose not to use the stimulants, you will be able to use them separately.
If checked, medical module will automatically apply special radioprotector "Indralin-B190".
When enabled, medical module will automatically administer a blood clotting agent to the body.
When enabled, medical module will automatically inject a psi-protecting drug into the body.
If checked, medical module will automatically inject a universal antidote into the body.
If this checkbox is enabled, medical module will automatically inject a drug that increases overall stamina.

Pressing the key will diagnose the current state of health according to the three main criteria-general condition, bleeding, radiation damage. That is, the level of the body's damage in each of these three parameters will be determined.
If you press the button, the medic will automatically perform treatment with one or another drug depending on results of diagnosis.
Opened the stalker's cache. Backpack contents: first-aid kit, Gravy artifact, rifle scope, two packs of armor-piercing ammo, some money.
Opened the stalker's cache. Backpack contents: artifact tentacle-stone, two offensive grenades, automatic AKM, army packs, some money.
Opened the stalker's cache. Backpack contents: Beretta 92FS pistol, two offensive grenades, underbarrel grenade launcher, Sponge artifact, some money.
Checking this box will automatically remove the item from the first slot of the backpack.
If enabled, the item will be automatically retrieved from the second slot of the backpack.
If enabled, the checkbox will automatically retrieve the item from the third slot of the Backpack.
If enabled, the checkbox will automatically retrieve the item from the fourth slot in the Backpack.
If enabled, the option will automatically retrieve the item from the fifth slot in the Backpack.
Pressing a key will reveal the contents of all five slots in the found stash.
Pressing the key will retrieve an item from whichever slot you chose.
Pressing the key will withdraw all items from the five available slots.
Stalker's hiding place opened. The backpack can't be reloaded and will be thrown away with the unused contents.
Stalker cache opened. Backpack contents: AKS-74 assault rifle, two packs of armor-piercing ammunition and some money.
A stalker's hiding place. Backpack contents: artifact tentacle-stone, two anabiotics, some money.
A stalker's cache was opened. Backpack contents: Beretta 92FS pistol, two offensive grenades, some money.
A stalker's cache was opened. Backpack contents: automatic rifle AH-94 Abakan, army packs, some money.
A stalker's cache is opened. Backpack contents: armored suit Wind of Freedom, first-aid kit AI-2, some money.
A stalker's cache was opened. Backpack contents: a silencer, a telescopic sight, two radioprotectors.
A stalker's cache was opened. Backpack contents: artifact Sponge, first-aid kit AI-2.
Stalker's cache was opened. Backpack contents: armor suit Zarya, two offensive grenades, detector Bear.
A stalker's cache is opened. Backpack contents: artifact Gravy, carbine Saiga, detector Bear.
Stalker's cache was opened. Backpack contents: Colt M16A2 rifle, first-aid kit AI-2, Army Pack.
Composition of the first aid kit:
Description of action. By clicking on the button you will take from the contents of the first aid kit a standard antihistamine.
Action description. If you click on the button, you can get Promedol from the medicine cabinet.
Action Description. If you click on the button, you can get a bandage from the medicine cabinet.
Action description. When you click on the button, you can get the antidote from the medicine cabinet.
Action description. After you click the button, you can get Vicasol from the medicine cabinet.
Action description. When you click on the button you can take canned stew of beef in a jar from the medkit.
Action description. If you click on the button you can take potato mashed potatoes in a packed bundle from the suhpraday contents.
Action description. When you click on the button you take the special mashed rice with beef in a jar from the suhpaya contents.
Action description. Click on the button to take a bar of dark chocolate from the cloth.
Action description. When you click on the button, you can take an orange juice in a bag from the packed lunch contents.
Action description. When you click on the button, you can take army biscuits from the packed dry food.
Description of action. When you click on the button you can take special chicken liver pate in a jar from the suhpai contents.
Action description. When you click on the button you take an energy drink with caffeine in a jar from the suhpraday contents.
The contents of the IRP-P dry rations:
Rice porridge with beef; can (250 g.); 2 pcs.
Content of the IRP-B dry rations:
Rice porridge with beef; jar (250 g); 2 pcs.
First aid kit AI-2 has been used.
Description of the first action. By clicking on the button you can take an antishock medicine from the contents of the first aid kit; its quantity is 3 pcs.
Description of the second action. After you have clicked on the button you can take a bandage from the first aid box.
Description of the third action. 3 Special Anti-Radiation Medicine - click on the button to take 3 pcs. of Special Anti-Radiation Medicine from the first aid kit.
Description of the fourth action. Special antidote for OPC poisoning. 2 pcs.
Description of the fifth action. If you click on the button, you will take 1 special antidote from the first aid box.
Contents of the AI-2 first aid kit:
4th nest; antidote for ARV poisoning; 2 pcs.
The AI-4 first aid kit was used.
Description of the first action. After clicking on the button you can take an antishock medicine from the contents of the first aid kit. Quantity 3 pcs.
Description of the second action. 3 Bandages can be taken from the individual first aid kit by clicking on the button.
Description of the third action. 1 antimicrobial from the first aid kit.
Description of the fourth action. If you click on the button, the essence of the first aid kit contains a special antibiotic.
Description of the fifth action. On clicking on the button you can take an experimental antidote from the first aid box.
Contents of first aid kit AI-4:
To connect the gravity assembly - 5 Goldfish artifacts are needed.
To connect the chemical assembly - you need 5 Mica artifacts.
To connect the thermal assembly - you need 5 Mama's Beads artifacts.
To build the listening devices you need 5 special microcircuits, 15 capacitors and 10 inductors each with their own special markings.
Result: Mustard agent 3*10-3 mg/l, VX- 1*10-3 mg/l, no POPs.

Description of the first action. Sample analysis. When you click on the button, a window of the same name will open in front of you, in which you will have to carry out a certain sequence of actions. During analysis you must enter numerical values for parameters N1 and N2. The data shall be entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the window with the same name.

Description of the second step. Sample evaluation. After clicking the button the window of the same name will open, in which you have to carry out a certain sequence of actions. During the evaluation you need to enter numerical values of coefficients parameters on the X and Y axes. The data will be entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the window of the same name.

The third procedure is described. Result. Clicking the button will open a window of the same name, which will display a visualization of the result of WHR operation. You can close this window simply by finishing your work.
Video pulse reference parameters: Frequency-1KHz, Amplitude-1,5mV.
Scale: Rin-1 MOhm, Svx-30 pF; X-end of kV/del, Y-end of 50ms/del.
The shape of the electrical signal: sinusoidal, Period-0.2s, Amplitude-20V.

Description of the first step. Calibration. A window of the same name will open on clicking the button. You are to enter numerical values (amplitude and frequency) for the reference video pulse as part of the calibration procedure. The data is entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the calibration window.

Description of the second action. Scaling. Click the button to open the window with the same name. During the scaling procedure you are to enter numerical values of coefficient parameters on the X and Y axes. The data will be entered in special fields. The values themselves will be indicated in the scaling window.

Description of the third action. Signal visualization. Clicking the button opens a window of the same name that displays the result of the oscilloscope display. You can close this window by finishing your work.
The treatment module has completed its work.
Diagnosis carried out. Using the reference data, determine a possible diagnosis: 1-, 2-, 3-.

Metamizole sodium (Analgin) is a drug, analgesic and antipyretic of the pyrazolone group. Withdrawn from circulation in many countries because of the risk of agranulocytosis. It belongs to the NSAID group of pyrazolone derivatives. The mechanism of action is similar to other NSAIDs (non-selectively blocks COX and reduces prostaglandin formation from arachidonic acid). Prevents conduction of pain extra- and proprioreceptive impulses through Gaul and Bourdach bundles, increases threshold of excitability of thalamic centres of pain sensitivity, increases heat dissipation. Indications\nFever syndrome (infectious-inflammatory diseases, insect bites - mosquitoes, bees, gadflies, etc., post-transfusion complications); Pain syndrome (mild to moderate intensity): including neuralgia, myalgia, arthralgia... Privately recommended for hypothermia and thready pulse.

Vicasol. Vicasol takes part in the formation of prothrombin by the liver and helps to normalise blood clotting. The action of Vicasol appears 12-18 hours after administration. Indications for use.\nHypo-and avitaminosis K, obstructive jaundice, acute hepatitis, parenchymal, capillary, hemorrhoidal, gastric, intestinal, nasal and pulmonary bleeding; Injuries, operations, radiation sickness, thrombocytopenic purpura, last month of pregnancy (to prevent haemorrhage in newborns), uterine juvenile and premenopausal bleeding, spontaneous bleeding in preparation for operations with difficult haemostasis, septic diseases with haemorrhagic phenomena, overdose of anticoagulants (dicumarin, phenylline). In special cases it is recommended for use in case of patient's state of shock.

Dicinon. Hemostatic drug. Its hemostaticatic effect is based on the intensification of the first step of the haemostasis mechanism (endothelium-platelet interaction). It is proved that Dicynon increases platelet adhesion, stabilises the capillary walls, thus reducing their permeability, inhibits the synthesis of those prostaglandins that cause platelet disaggregation, vasodilation and increased capillary permeability. This leads to a shorter bleeding time and reduced blood loss. Dicynon has no effect on the coagulation mechanism, prothrombin time, fibrinolysis and platelet levels (normal). It is recommended for low blood platelet counts.

Dioxidine is a domestic synthetic broad-spectrum AMP. It was approved for medical use in 1976. Due to peculiarities of toxicology with systemic action (IV) it is used only by vital indications for treatment of severe forms of anaerobic or mixed aerobic-anaerobic infections caused by multiresistant strains when other AMPs are ineffective or intolerant. In severe purulent infections it can be used in the cavity, endobronchially, topically. Mechanism of action\nDioxidine has a bactericidal effect, the mechanism of which is not fully understood. Dioxidine activity is enhanced in anaerobic environment due to induction of reactive oxygen species formation. In special cases it is recommended to use in low blood leucocyte counts.

Bandage is a strip of cloth (gauze, canvas, linen, flannel) used for dressing wounds, bandages. The structure of a medical bandage consists of a complex weave of cotton threads. A bandage fabric consists of two intertwined thread systems, positioned perpendicular to each other. In individual cases it is best applied when the patient is conscious and his general condition is within normal limits.

Morphine is a drug that has an analgesic (opioid) effect. Derivatives of morphine, particularly hydrochloride (for injection) and sulphate (as an oral medication), are used medicinally. Morphine is effective in suppressing feelings of severe physical pain and pain of psychogenic origin. It also has sedative activity and suppresses the cough reflex. In special cases, it is recommended for use with a weak pulse and normal body temperature.

Tramal- Opioid synthetic analgesic with central and spinal cord effects (promotes opening of K+ and Ca2+-channels, causes membrane hyperpolarisation and inhibition of pain impulse conduction), enhances sedative effects. In special cases it is used for hyperthermia and rapid pulse.

Reopolyglucin is a plasma exchange solution, the specific effect of which is to increase the suspension properties of blood, reducing its viscosity, contributing to the restoration of blood flow in the small capillaries, preventing and eliminating the aggregation of blood-forming elements. Reopolyglucin is used to improve capillary blood flow in order to prevent and treat traumatic, surgical, toxic and burn shock. It is recommended for hypotension and elevated white blood cell counts.

Penicillins are antimicrobials belonging to the class of b-lactam antibiotics. Currently, the penicillin group consists of drugs that are divided into several subgroups, depending on their origin, chemical structure and antimicrobial activity. It is particularly recommended in cases of elevated erythrocyte counts.

Cifran is an antimicrobial of the fluoroquinolone group. The mechanism of action is due to inhibition of bacterial DNA-gyrase enzyme and disruption of DNA synthesis. Cifran is active against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, including strains resistant to penicillins, cephalosporins and aminoglycosides. In special cases, it is recommended for high platelet counts in the blood.

Erythromycin is a bacteriostatic antibiotic of macrolide group, binds reversibly to 50S-subunit of ribosomes, which disrupts formation of peptide bonds between amino acid molecules and blocks protein synthesis of microorganisms (does not affect nucleic acid synthesis). When used in high doses, depending on the type of pathogen, it may show bactericidal effect. Recommended for low erythrocyte counts.

First-action description. Analysis of the injured person's condition. When you click on the button, a window will open in which you will see a full analysis of the wounded person's condition according to certain parameters. These parameters should be recorded in order to be able to select the correct medicines for further treatment. The selection of the preporters is done by identifying the correspondence of the particular preporters to the individual cases. The window can be closed when the parameters of the evaluation module have been saved.

Description of second step. Background information. Clicking the button will bring up a window of the same name, which will show you the reference data for the 12 preparations used in the device. The player will need to read this information to select the correct preparatum for use in the third module. It is important to pay attention to the information for particular cases. For example, Cifran is recommended for high platelet counts in the blood. Therefore, it should be used when the first module shows the corresponding figures.

Description of the third action. Treatment module. Click the button to open a window where you will need to enter a specific combination of preparations for one or another wounded person's condition. The preparations are entered according to the analysis data and their comparison with the reference data.

Description of the first action. Signal recognition. A window of the same name will open on pressing the button. The recognition run must scan the signal frequency, pass it through a band-pass filter and determine the carrier frequency of the high-frequency pulse. This value is sent to the LF transducer in order to prepare it for interpretation.

Description of the second step. Decoding. Clicking the button takes you to the window of the same name, in which a certain sequence of operations must be performed. During decoding it is necessary to pass the received LF signal through a complex of decoders. The decoded values are transmitted in binary code, after which they are transmitted to the decimal code generator.

Description of the third step. Finite Binary Code Generator. When you click on the button, a window of the same name will open in front of you, displaying the generated code and its input for cracking. You can simply close this window by finishing your work.
HS passed through PF...desired F found...converted to NS
electronic code generation completed...lock is broken.

Remember, your target is a middle-aged man. Bald and bearded. He dons regular merc armor, and he goes by the nickname Beast. His PDA marker should confirm his position on the map. Take position on the second floor of the grain elevator and wait for the target to appear. Make sure nobody else is with him, as this needs to be done without witnesses. After you eliminate him, return for your reward.

Damn, just for how long are we going to be waiting for you here? Getting real tired of you just wasting my time. And the place you guys picked is real shittystalkers on one side and mercenaries on the other Basically, a shithole. On top of that, Im overhearing some kind of shooting on the other side of the rail road embankment, so Im getting out of here. Im gonna wait for you in the tunnel under the embankment at night time. As for the price, it stays the same.

Beast, if youre reading this, it means Im no longer among the living Its very hard to write these words, but I have to ask for your forgiveness. Back when I first met you in the Cordon, I didnt really have a high opinion on you. And when you got trapped in the spatial anomaly, my opinion of you still didnt change. I was one of the few who wanted you out of our base because I thought you would only cause us problems. But I realize now how wrong I was I want to thank you for trying to save my life. Its too bad your efforts werent successful. I hope that all of you find your way out of this forsaken anomaly. Goodbye, Beast! \ nSincerely, Knucklehead.

"...The Lord has sent me a trial... For so many years I've been a tax collector, a thief, a murderer... I'm in the damned Zone, and what for? To deprive others of their lives again for profit... It's hell. Hell on earth, in life... To suffer, to earn redemption in blood. Past sins cannot be forgotten, cannot be undone, but the future is here, among others like me... The Higher Will knows what tomorrow holds for me, but everything is in my hands and salvation is not given by mere words or thoughts. I must prove by my deeds and my example that I am worthy..."

%c[default]I cant remember a thing My head hurts like hell Where am I? What is this place? Some sort of barn, it seems Damn it. That dream didnt help in the slightest Or maybe it wasnt a dream? What kind of creature did I see back there? And that laugh I can still hear it. So many questions and not a single answer All right, Beast, take it easy First, I need to sort everything out. What happened before the nightmare? The last thing I remember was the chase. Yeah, thats right, I caught Vector, but he managed to slip away from me. But how? Is he the one behind my appearance here? On second thought, it doesnt really matter now, does it? All right, I need to take out those zombies like Savage asked me to, and after that, I can start figuring out what happened.

%c[default]I took care of those damned zombies! Ugh, Zone, what are you doing to these people?! They gave birth to you, and you Well, I found a note on one of the zombies The contents do raise some questions. I suppose Savage will want to see this. Im going back to the barn. Or rather: back to base. I still cant believe Im stuck here. How the hell did I end up here? How did I survive? I need to find out more details.

%c[default]Ive never seen such a creature that close before Markus told me we need to find a way out of here, and hes right. I dont want to be here when that thing returns. What is it, anyway? A human, a mutant, or maybe another one of the Zones phantoms? Damn it The more I try to find an answer, the more questions arise. But enough chit-chatting I have to find a way out of here!

%c[default]Fucking hell! A damn controller! How do I keep running into these creatures? First the zombies and now this This must be a cabinet of curiosities, not the Zone of Alienation. At least the piece of shit is dead. Now I know how those Dutyers became zombified: the controller here drove them mad. Now that the creatures dead, our chance of getting out of here has been increased by two percent, which amounts to three percent. Well, its something.

%c[default]Savage is starting to get on my nerves with his requests. Wont he ever piss off? Do this. Find that. Kill this mutant. Beast is turning into a simple errandboy. What would the guys in the Syndicate say if they ever find out about this? On the other hand, things could be a lot worse. After all, Savage is just trying to keep us all alive. My life depends on it

%c[default]Hatchet and his squad will pay for what theyve done. I wont let them get away with Sledges death Hes right about one thing, though: Ive really lost it. This place has changed me. I dont feel so cold-blooded anymore, or perhaps thats not the case? Either way, Markus told me hes got some kind of plan. I need to ask him about it.

%c[default]About a month has passed since the death of Sledgehammer, and things havent gotten better Whether it was a coincidence or not, things went to hell after that night. Infected meat didnt turn out to be the best type of food, and now we have a whole epidemic in ourbase. Ive managed to find some medicine for the guys, but unfortunately, its not enough. They still need further treatment. Right now, all I can do is pray to God that the vaccines will work.

%c[default]Those numskulls have put me behind bars with some bandits. They think Im some kind of threat Yeah. The ironyeven though Ive escaped the anomaly, Im still trapped. I went through so much in there lost so many friends. The guard tells me that Markus didnt make it out of the anomaly, but how? Where is he? I should talk to Savage about this. This is likely the last time I write in this notebook. I dont want to write down my worries anymore. I dont even know how Ill keep living my life. I feel dead inside

I managed to escape but my leg still hurts. That snork came out of nowhere and I couldnt react in time. At the very least my legs not broken. I wasted my last cartridges on that mutant. Listen, Alex, if youre reading this, know that Im still alive. Wait for me in the basement. Ill be here tonight. I think well find a way out of here if we stick together. Just wait for me, okay? Sincerely, Crosstie!

"I'm so hungry. It must have been two days since I had a crumb in my mouth. The dim lantern barely illuminated with its dim light the impenetrable darkness deep into the bunker. Aslan, our guide, who had led the group away from the chase, stopped whimpering, and it seemed to us that he was no longer breathing. Zhenka's hand touched his neck, in a vain attempt to feel for a pulse on the carotid artery. Half a minute, a minute... She turned away and covered her face with her palm, trying to pull herself together and not sob. She took a few steps back from her guide's breathless body and literally collapsed to the floor. This time she could no longer hold back the heartbreaking scream that burst out. I tried to calm her down, but it was useless. Her nerves had finally given out. We did not know how much longer we had to live and waited for the inevitable end. After a couple of days she went quiet. I don't know how much longer she would have convulsed, but her consciousness finally gave out. She sat on her half-bent knees, slowly shaking her head, and looked into the distance with those bottomless, empty eyes full of tears. After a couple of hours, she died. I'm next. I didn't think I'd have any use for it. The bullet taken from that loser soldier came in handy. It'll be over soon. I take the safety off and put a round in the chamber. One swipe of the finger and we all meet again."

"One day to live. Just one day. Every hour, every minute, until my last breath. While the sky is strewn with stars, while the dew sprinkles the grass with its sparkling radiant freshness. No one in this corrupted world, crippled by bile, pain and prejudice can be as genuinely happy as I am. You are all but cogs in its satanic system of advanced capitalism, faceless shadows that exist according to the set rules of behind-the-scenes puppeteers and secret masters. I escaped from this quagmire, I managed to get out and now I am free. Free from everything. And from myself. If only to live to see tomorrow... If only to live. The Zone frees the slaves of the outside world. It absolves you of your sins and helps you start a new life with a clean slate. It frees you from debts and obligations, giving you a chance to follow only your own chosen path. Let it be short, let it be till the first anomaly or stray bullet, but nevertheless it is your own path. And when you die with your last breath, you will remember the taste of her tender lips for that last hot kiss, her hazy eyes full of unshed salty tears. She blesses her children on their last journey. Zone knows that only a few will make it back, to repeat the race tomorrow. One breath, one gulp of air and a new step towards the unknown. Towards their freedom...".
The entry in the document reads.

"Anyway, that waffler of yours, he couldn't do anything right. "How many times we've bent him over since he got punched, it's all for naught. Either he's a hired gun, or he's working for the mob - we can't find out. That's why we gotta deal with him. And solve it quickly, so that our lawyer, the hired bitch, doesn't get wind of it without his knowledge. They tried to get the guy on our side, offered him money. He's not the right client. Apparently, he's crazy. That's the way it is. And on the subject of that winged bastard, it's pretty clear. Kill the bastard. Right away, before he fledges, you pigeon. He leaked information to the lawyer about the Kordon case, and he leaked it with guts. And Sidor, the bitch, has already passed it on to who knows where. Fucking gabist, keep him breathing. Prepare the action for the end of the month. Get a lawyer involved, too, so life doesn't seem like such a big deal to him. Plan for his elimination at the same time. Quietly, so as not to attract the attention of the left. It's high time he retired. And don't overdo it with Sidor. Keep the bastard alive. Preferably kill the lawyer in front of him, so he remembers his lesson and his place. That's it, get to work."

"Eh, you should've done it. What's the use of that cocksucker taking it to heart? Who's gonna control all the cargo in the suburbs now? Siwy? His brain atrophied the moment his whore mother fucked her ghoul. And there ain't no more people. There ain't no people. Serge is an even bigger prick. He's a real prick. He just wants to put someone down, make a fool out of himself. I can't understand how those idiots nominated him to be a kingpin. It's their mess, let them untangle it themselves. The fact that he's not pulling - no problem, a knife under the rib and into the anomaly. You don't even have to bury it. And good riddance. Okay, I'm getting off-topic here. So, get the money to grease the goblins, because they've become very nervous. The birds seem to be huddled up in their pigeonhole. It's not a problem to take them out. Rake in the other. Some fierce kid was making another visit to the centre of the Zone. We tried to track him down, but it didn't work. Too serious a pro to give up. The blues in the Dark Valley took them all out. Plus a lot of our guys got killed in the dump. So run this guy through the official channels. Get to work, boys. You're our only hope for now."

Step by step he approached his goal. Again and again he stepped over the decayed foliage, trying to pay as little attention as possible to the half-decayed corpses which now and again met him on the way. The traveler walked, not ceasing to think about his ridiculously perished companion, seemingly being detached from everything that was happening around him. The blind dog, whimpering pitifully and unknotting a paw that had been broken for days, hurriedly retreated from the road and hid in the bushes. He grinned in a predatory manner and looked after him, thanking his canine luck that this time he was lucky. It began to rain. It fell from the heavy sky, showering the dead ground with the resounding clatter of drops. The road became washed out and the traveller's walk became more and more difficult. But the bodies of hapless hunters for easy prey were fewer and fewer in number. He did let someone get away. Which may even have been done for nothing. Though he had given them their chance. Maybe they would take it and save their worthless, unnecessary lives...

...Every creature in the Southern Zone knew him. Such a peculiar signature could only be found in a handful of people who made a living out of it. Murder was a craft that was commonplace here and few could be surprised. All but one... Orders to kill undesirable people poured in from customers to middlemen several times a day and became as common as eating three meals a day among conscripts. Over the years, an entire network of hired assassins spread out among the stalkers of the southern clans, controlling one territory or another and working for them like scavengers. The mercenary clans became shadow masters here, whose will identified everything here - law and justice and execution. But a separate caste of loners, even among them, kept aloof. People without a past and without a future, living for one day and one minute, such as Max were rare and priceless. They knew that they were the best in their business and everyone who turned to them understood this at the first meeting. No one knew where they came from or how long they'd been in the Zone, but it had taken them in like family, constantly nurturing and instilling more and more deadly skills in them. Max was an extra class specialist, but his latest order changed a lot of things. Why and why he took a different path no one knew, perhaps even himself.
The access code will be designated as follows:\nand the binary encryption method must be learnt and applied. Only some members of the grouping know the cipher itself and the key to it.

The encryption key is:
Encryption using binary code:\ Each letter of Russian alphabet is encrypted with binary code, e.g. letter A=00000, B=00001, C=00010, D=00011..., I=11111.
Example: The word SHIFT. In binary code it looks like this:
11000 01000 10100 10000 
 Now shift it to the LEFT 1 step and we get the code:
10000 10001 01001 00001 
 Now convert it back to letters to get the text:

For reverse decoding, you need to perform a RIGHT shift to get the binary code of the original combination.

Anyway, I figured it out. Encryption method:
Encryption using Caesar's cipher:\ Each letter of the Russian alphabet is encrypted with its counterpart, obtained by shifting the whole alphabet by a given step.
The basic alphabet is: ABBVGEEEDZHYKLNOPRSTUCHCHSHYYYYYY
Alphabetical correspondence in step 7: ZZYYYKLMNOPRSTUFCHCHSHYYYEYYAABWHEED
That is, instead of A in the encrypted text, the encrypted text will contain the letter G, instead of G, the letter Y, etc.:
For reverse decryption, you need to do a reverse lookup to get the decrypted text of the original combination of words.
This text could be a rearranged word combination. The next step is to put them in order and after understanding the meaning of the phrase find a four digit numeric correspondence. This four-digit code is the combination we need to open the lock of the hiding place.
The encrypted text is as follows: SHLFV SCHLTSCHFHR FJA ILTPSPR SCHEIKZH TSKT ÚJKUPCHJT

In short, now it seems to be clear what's going on here. Encryption method:
Encryption using Caesar's cipher:\ Each letter of the Russian alphabet is encrypted with its counterpart, obtained by shifting the whole alphabet by a given step.
The basic alphabet is: ABBVGEEEDZHYKLNOPRSTUCHCHSHYYYYYY
Alphabetical correspondence in step 7: ZZYYYKLMNOPRSTUFCHCHCHSHYYEYYAABWHEED
That is, instead of A in the encrypted text, the encrypted text will contain the letter G, instead of G, the letter Y, etc.:
For reverse decryption, you need to do a reverse lookup to get the decrypted text of the original combination of words.
This text could be a rearranged word combination. The next step is to put them in order and after understanding the meaning of the phrase find a four digit numeric correspondence. This four digit code is the combination we need to open the hiding place.
The encrypted text is as follows: FLZLSHFHL EZHCHSHCHH TSKHK HSHCJFH ZVTH YZHSHSHCHPFHUH SHJTTJH

%c[default]God damn! Barely made it to Pripyat. I really miss the bar right now. The commander sent us to check some kind of anomaly near the old service center A spatial anomaly or something. If I knew what the Zone had in store for us, Id never go there Everything seemed quiet at first, and then mutants came at us from all openings, so our only way was into the anomaly. Then we woke up in this place. Now, wherever we go, we always end up back near this barn. How long is this going to continue? This must be the end for me. Getting out of here alive seems impossible. Munitions are running out, and we wont last long without them.\n

%c[0,1,0,0]-%c[default]A chemical reaction using three key components is needed to synthesise the poison. Before you start the synthesis, you need to calculate the concentration of the starting components. One of the two reactions to choose from, which takes place under the action of a catalyst, has the following input and output ratios. X*(ðåà-íò1)2+Y*(ðåà-íò2)2+Z*(ðåà-íò3)2=2*(ðåà-íò1)(ðåà-íò2)3(ðåà-íò3)+8*(ðåà-íò3)+2*(ðåà-íò1) X*(ðåà-íò1)3+Y*(ðåà-íò2)2+Z*(ðåà-íò3)2=2*(ðåà-íò1)(ðåà-íò2)5+6*(ðåà-íò3)+2*(ðåà-íò1)2 The concentration of one unit of a substance in the input is 10. Calculate the coefficients in the equation and multiply by the number 10 to determine the input concentrations of the components. The possible values of X,Y,Z multiplied by 10.
30 50 20
 20 50 30
 50 30 20
 20 30 50
 30 20 50
 50 20 30
Radio frequency range, number and type of channels:
Channel 1; frequency 48.975 MHz; closed peacekeeping force.
The communication session will be terminated by clicking on the button.
By clicking on the button, you tune the radio to receive the signal from the frequency of the first open channel. Switching to a closed channel is not possible without special firmware.

Description of the first action. By clicking on the button you tune your radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel. To stop the reception you must press the "Stop" button. It is not possible to switch to another channel during operation.

Description of the second action. By clicking on the button you will tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the grouping "Duty". To stop reception you must press the "Stop" button. It is not possible to switch to another channel during operation.

Description of the third action. By clicking on the button you will tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the "Freedom" grouping. To stop receiving, you must press the "Stop" button. It is not possible to switch to another channel during operation.

Description of the fourth action. By clicking on the button, you tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the "Mercenaries" faction. To stop receiving, you must press the "Stop" button. It is not possible to switch to another channel during operation.

Description of the fifth action. By clicking on the button you will tune the radio station to receive the signal from the frequency of the first closed channel of the "Monolith" faction. To stop receiving, you must press the "Stop" button. It is not possible to switch to another channel during operation.

One day while Muhammad was sleeping near Al Kaaba, he was awakened by Jibril. The angel had a wonderful beast called Burak who said that it had carried all the Prophets and that it would now carry Muhammad. Muhammad boarded the Burak which carried him by air to Jerusalem. There he met Ibrahim (Abraham), Musa (Moses), Isa (Jesus) and other prophets. They all prayed together and Muhammad led the prayer, then he was offered a drink from three vessels: water, wine and milk. Muhammad chose the milk jar, and that meant his congregation was on the right path. Wine, on the other hand, has been forbidden to Muslims ever since. Then a ladder descended to him, on which he and Jibril ascended to the seven heavens. In the lower heaven He saw Adam deciding the fate of the souls of the dead. The angels showed Muhammad hell, and he felt the heat of the fire and saw the terrible torment of sinners. As He ascended from heaven, He met the Prophets: on the second, Isa; on the third, Jusuf; on the fourth, Idris; on the fifth, Harun; on the sixth, Musa; on the seventh, Ibrahim....

...Then Muhammad visited Paradise, where he saw the bliss of the believers. Then Allah spoke to him and obliged Muslims to pray 50 times a day. When Muhammad went back down, Musa persuaded him to return to Allah and ask Him to reduce the number of prayers. This was repeated several times until the number of prayers for the Muslims was reduced to five a day. When Muhammad told of his journey, he was not believed. People said, "The caravan goes there for a whole month, how can you fly there in one night?" Even Abu Bakr, a loyal friend of his, had doubts. Then Muhammad described to him the Jerusalem he had seen from above, which he had never been to before. These descriptions matched Abu Bakr's memories of the city and Muhammad's words were confirmed to be true. Muhammad also told of a caravan which he had also seen from above. The caravan arrived in Mecca some time later and his story was confirmed.

One day a mullah came into the hall to address the worshippers. The hall was empty except for a young stable boy who sat in the front row. The mullah thought to himself: "Should I speak or not?" So he ventured to ask the groom: - There is no one here but you, do you think I should speak or not? The groom replied: - Sir, I am a simple man, I know nothing about it. But when I come to the stable and see that all the horses have scattered and there is only one left, I will still give it something to eat. The mullah, taking these words to heart, began his sermon. He spoke for more than two hours and when he finished he was relieved. He wanted to hear confirmation of how good his speech had been. He asked: - How did you like my sermon? - I have already said that I am a simple man and do not really understand it all. But if I come to the stable and see that all the horses have scattered and there is only one left, I will feed her anyway. But I don't give her all the feed that is meant for all the horses.

Ibrahim became disillusioned with idols and sought other gods: "And when night covered him, he saw a star and said: "This is my Lord!" And when it rolled up, he said: "I don't like the sunset." When he saw the moon rising, he said: "This is my Lord!" And when it went down, he said: "Unless my Lord leads me on a straight path, I shall be of the people who have gone astray." And when he saw the sun rising, he said: "This is my Lord, he is the greater!" And when it had set, he said: "O my people, I have no part in that which you give Him as a partner. Now I have turned my face to Him who created the heavens and the earth, worshipping Him purely, and I am not of the polytheists." (Quran,6:76-79)

An eastern ruler wanted to know the whole history of mankind. A wise man brought him five hundred volumes. Busy with affairs of state, the king sent him away, commanding him to put it all in a shorter form. After twenty years the wise man returned: the history of mankind now occupied only fifty volumes, but the king was already too old to be able to cope with so many thick books, and sent the wise man away again. Another twenty years passed, and the aged, gray-haired sage brought the king a single volume containing all the wisdom of the world that he longed to know. The king, however, was on his deathbed, and had no time to read even one of the books. Then the wise man expounded to him the history of mankind in a single line, and it read: "Man is born, suffers and dies".
18.04.11. The performance of the prototype, after comparing it with the results of the analysis, shows that it cannot be used.

19.04.11. Test run at 75% of maximum power confirmed the previous assumption. The consequences of the experiment on modified human embryos have yielded fruitful results. The bred mutant specimens possessed truly unique properties. The subject obtained an innate resistance to psi-environment and radiation of any intensity. The altered gene structure allowed the creatures to create a specific aura of semi-electrical and thermal nature around themselves. Further research in this area will be carried out along three other lines. All data is to be classified.

20.04.11. The question of expediency of application of installation for trial test of local anomaly of CHA class within the limited area with radius of 25 meters in area of static pump station on southern bogs was raised. To schedule the experiment for 24.04.11 with the baseline data given in the annex of the following entry.

22.04.11. Creation of the local centre of CH anomaly occurrence to be carried out according to the preliminary agreement with the object. For the experiment use the following input parameters: A= 15, k1=5, k2= 10, k3=0, T0= 250

25.04.11. Focal zone creation was successful. The anomaly was activated as scheduled in normal mode. Measurements in the area of impact revealed a positive trend in the parameters of the location and statics of the object. The experiment should be considered successful. It is recommended to use the above input parameters of the prototype as a reference for further experiments in this area.

13.48 05.06.11.The scheduled work on battery replacement went wrong. About 25 minutes after the start of the cooling procedure, the system failed. Forced de-energising had no effect. The reverse reaction began. De-energising the entire complex was only a matter of time.

14.35 05.06.11. Main power generator shutdown. Instant failure of backup power system due to severe power surge. Destabilisation of the security fence system as a consequence. Immediate evacuation of all personnel.

15.03 05.06.11. There was an explosion in the reagent storage facility due to depressurisation of the waste material. The situation was completely out of control. Reagents spread slower without working exhaust ventilation system, but standard ventilation system cannot cope. If personnel are not evacuated within half an hour, this lab will become a crypt. Three guards have already died trying to contain the flood of creatures trying to enter the complex. The others won't last long.

15.25 05.06.11. Several bloodsuckers have broken through the security line. The remaining fighters tried to retreat through an escape hatch, but it didn't save them. They were crushed by the masses. We're urgently barricading ourselves in room 18.48. The ventilation outlets are blocked, but that's another twenty minutes at most. Breathing masks will last another two hours...

17.12 05.06.11. Air in cylinders left for half an hour. Two of ours couldn't take it and tried to get through. The mutants tore them to shreds. We don't know how much longer we can hold out. Even with six of us we have no chance. There is no place to wait for help - they will not know about the accident and death until 24 hours later, about our deaths a little later. We won't be able to save ourselves... Before the system was launched, I noticed Professor Kamensky had risen to the surface. The accident was probably planned. A diversion... Avenge us...

03.03.11. Reports have been received from the chief with orders to prepare the control room for unloading. Delivering all necessary materials on time to the Valley complex is of paramount importance to us. The main facility should be tested as normal. After that a complete shutdown of the Swamp facility is possible.
04.03.11. Professor Mitrofanov and his scientific team in full were sent to the new place of work. Preparation for the first tests of the Dolina site should start within a week.

07.03.11. A report on the preparatory work carried out should be handed over to the project management within the next three days. Ensure that the regulations and all necessary rules are strictly adhered to in preparation for commissioning.

09.03.11. The project leaders have set as a top priority the commissioning of the Valley project as soon as possible. In addition, it was decided to continue work on additional profiles at the Bogs site, in particular on the tasks of the CHAh project.
12.03.11 The Dolina project site is now operational. Moving on to capacity allocation as per regulations.

02.08.11. What an abomination this collector is. Nearly got into the middle of nowhere. Shit. Anomalies all around. Who would think to put some kind of installation here? It's a good cover, though. Just as long as it's the right one.

04.08.11. The approaches to the closed laboratory complex still managed to find the next day. Two conductors were killed. One has fallen in a jelly, the second was struck on the head by something heavy burer who has appeared from nowhere.

05.08.11. After long four hours of work our electronic specialist managed to crack the code lock to the preserved object. There's no lighting at all. Apparently, the backup generator failed in the accident, too. I don't know why, but something prevents me from moving forward. No fear, but it is anxious somehow.

06.08.11. It is impossible to pass to the lowest levels. The pass is blocked by anomaly of unknown nature. What we've seen here is enough for many years to come. The facility personnel have been wiped out. A separate group of four were found trapped inside one of the sterilisers. Died of asphyxiation. What could have happened here is still unclear. It feels like someone shut down the security and life support system and mothballed the facility.

07.08.11. The main module's electronic chip is in place. Trying to leave the facility through the upper manifold branch. The beast is pulling up in increasing numbers. If we survive, it'll be a miracle. Just to make it to the emergency tunnel.

Project O-Consciousness is gaining strength again. This time Krechet and Severin will stop at nothing. The scramble they started with the use of sectarian groups could have very far-reaching consequences. In addition to the Monolith fanatics in the O-Consciousness operations, the Sin faction can be singled out. As it became known, the former group of crazy cannibal stalkers was almost completely wiped out a couple of months ago. The leader was eliminated by a lone stalker, Ghost, and the combined clans of Dutya, Freedom, and several smaller stalker groups finished off the rest of the sinners. As it turned out, this was not the only nest. The surviving members of the group were later found and recruited into a new project.

The renewed Sin was augmented by the remnants of the destroyed Black Slugs gangland clan. They emerged just before the climax of the operation. They took down one Debtor's Quad and immediately disappeared.

A reconnaissance detachment of the Sin Group was spotted by the Eastern Mercenary Brigade near Limansk. When they appeared in direct line of sight they engaged in a skirmish. One sectarian was killed. Two of the mercenaries were wounded. The skirmish lasted five or seven minutes, after which both disappeared. The Svoboda men who found themselves at the scene of the skirmish discovered a body.

It was learned that the sinners were being trained according to a programme similar to that of the Monolith. However, their psychological processing was conducted at a higher level. Apparently, the O-consciousness used new programs-codons, programming sinners did not make them soulless soldiers - they obey orders without question, but at the same time have inherent tactical and strategic skills of trained fighters fighting. In addition, it has become known about the training of experienced saboteurs, who are supposed to be introduced into enemy groups.
It was the coordinated work of sabotage groups of saboteurs that provoked a new round of faction warfare. The alignment of the central and southern clans is the work of Sinners and O-Consciousness.

Colleagues, I remind you that the access codes to the closed Swamp facility will soon be changed. It will be necessary to undergo a re-operation to change the security certificates. In this regard, it is necessary to reset the default keys in the ProCrypto system. Regenerate internal system password, generate a request for a new security certificate for the existing operational key and generate a new technological access key. This operation must be performed as soon as possible in order to avoid possible information leakage. In addition, the master encryptions in the transmission system will be updated. Security will be supervised at the main base by Suslov. Try to deliver all necessary information via ground couriers, and as soon as possible. In addition to the troopers, it is also possible to transmit information through the communications of the Swamp facility.

The transmission of the most relevant data on Clear Skies projects is in encrypted form. Encryption of a minimum degree of complexity is used. The first cipher, Caesar's alphabetic cipher, with a 5 (10) letter backward shift of the alphabetic string, was not used. It is sufficient to read the text of the reversed cipher.
