Selection is an optional skill, but it can come in handy for the protagonist to perform artmodification from available artefacts. It can be learned in stages from a local breeder. You can upgrade one of the known properties of an artefact. To learn the skill, you need to get information for the breeder to fine tune the special equipment, for each artifact separately.
Armour repair is an optional skill, but you can use it to repair your armour with the special repair kit.
Armour repair is an optional skill, but you can use it to repair your weapon with special repair kits.
A compulsory skill that allows the main character to learn how to work with a large variety of devices. Required for the successful completion of Red's assigned task.
A compulsory skill that allows the main character to learn how to work with a wide variety of components. Required for the completion of Red's mission.
A skill that comes in handy when the main character is hunting mutants - extracting valuable trophies from the carcasses.
A skill that will be useful for the main character when he is hunting mutants - extracting valuable trophies from carcasses.(You need the Basic Hunting skill to learn it).
A skill necessary to create a full-fledged anomaly detector.
Skill required to build a full artifact detector.
Skill required to build a full life form detector.
A skill required to provide medical treatment of varying degrees of complexity.
Skills required to survive in the PRAZOH environment.
Skill required to protect against pickpocketing, and to make your own thefts.
A radar warfare skill needed to conduct various operations in this specialty.
Various records found in the laboratory complex. They contain interesting and important information that might interest many, making them valuable.
Various audio and video recordings found in the lab complex. They contain interesting and important information that will be of interest to many people.
Various audio and video recordings found in the lab complex. They contain interesting and important information that will be of interest to many people.
Various audio and video recordings found in the lab complex. They contain interesting and important information that will be of interest to many people.
Various audio and video recordings found in the lab complex. They contain some interesting and important information that will be of interest to many people.

"The research carried out in this direction has yielded almost no results. Most of the subjects failed to survive the second day after surgery. There was a dramatic increase in haemoglobin levels in the blood, after administration of strain 3219, but this was not enough. The death rate was one hundred per cent. It was not possible to develop prototypes within the specified time frame. An attack on Fedorov's group in the Dark Valley would also not benefit the organisation's future activities. Although it is likely that the mercenaries carried out only demonstrative action, to divert the eyes of other competitors. Fedorov himself was not harmed. We draw your attention to the increased consolidation of Freedom's strike force in a strategic direction for us. Be prepared to repel an attack. Securing the facility is a priority.

"In essence, Project Dion was not something super important and top secret, rather it performed only a demonstration function, to attract corrupt investors from behind the cordon. They would not have been able to offer them anything new or unique anyway. This was only a deception designed to divert suspicion from their main routes and suppliers. The science complex itself, where the equipment was housed, and Dion's main server installations, was an offshoot of the X-10 Laboratory, on the main project of O-Consciousness. This complex was located in the northern part of Dead City, between partitioned basements and underground bunkers. A number of recruited staff from a related organisation worked in the complex. They were partly neutral towards us, at least Plutarch managed to get some of the information he needed from them. After the territory was taken by the Duty clan, the fate of the project is unknown. In the event of any confirmation of its discovery or destruction, an expedition to the specified quadrant should be organised immediately.

"The barrier may have been man-made in nature. Approximately the same radiation was detected by Ralph and his men in the vicinity of Amber Lake. However, the attempt to enter the compound ended in disaster. The sudden destabilization of the psi environment in the area resulted in the death of the reconnaissance team. The scientists in the bunker only held up their hands. It was not within their remit to restore the original situation. It had been determined that the laboratory existing beneath the main complex, under the index X-16, was the source of the said radiation. Without multi-level psi protection it was not possible to be in its affected area. Allied stalkers should be warned that it is impossible to carry out any activities in the area of Amber Lake. Closure of the area indefinitely. It is highly desirable to obtain the support of interested parties in the development of comprehensive protective equipment and an operation to eliminate the hazardous object. The experience gained could then be used to possibly make a breakthrough through the main barrier to the ghost town of Pripyat."

"We don't know why this all happened. The experiment went according to the planned schedule. However, something went wrong. Some little thing we didn't take into account and failed to understand. We didn't know how it would end. The mercenaries had failed in their task. Their convoys were dying one by one in the streets of bloody Pripyat. Something eerie lurked at every turn and prevented them from even stepping through the clusters of anomalies. Shipments of equipment and finished goods failed to reach their destination. All this was unbearable, but no matter how hard they tried - neither requests nor threats succeeded in getting the result. Suppliers and buyers were furious and threatened to cancel the contracts. However, this was nothing. It was all empty sway compared to what we are facing now. Requesting an evacuation was our only option, if only it hadn't been for that unknown man in the black cloak who was pushing us down a knowingly false path every time. But we had no choice. Everything started to fall apart and we were forced to accept his game. And we lost. He destroyed each and every one of us, subjecting us to his will and the will of his patrons. He is but a pawn, but who but a pawn can find the strength to become a queen...?"

"The O-Consciousness made another move. And it was terrible. In fact, we did not know that preparations for the operation had begun long before our group of enthusiasts was formed. Even then they knew that all our efforts would be doomed to failure, and that neither I nor anyone else would be able to stop them. And the mere awareness of that thought squeezed my throat, preventing me from breathing. This helplessness was killing me. Our enemy had prepared this war between the clans and played his carte blanche. The startling went well. Freedom declared war on Duty and advanced its forces from the Dark Valley towards the Junkyard, and further southwest towards Agroprom and the Swamps. The bandits unexpectedly let them through unhindered, while attacking the Diggers and throwing forward units to the Cordon. Things got as tight as they could get, and we found ourselves caught in the grip of this inter-clan warfare cycle. The factions were festering themselves and could not see how someone had managed to deceive everyone and advance towards the unknown. And he will ruin us if he is not stopped."

"In essence, this complex was not a complex, rather it only had an exemplary function, to ward off commissions from other research institutes. The scientific complex itself was a large repository of all documentation for one of the O-Consciousness projects. The complex was located on the territory of the former Research Institute Agroprom. The complex employed staff, some of whom had been transferred from various laboratories. It did not play a special role, only collecting all sorts of documents and materials on the conducted research and experiments. Fortunately, before the Second Nuclear Catastrophe, all the basic documentation was removed from the Exclusion Zone. The rest of the materials were destroyed. After the accident the group of scientists did not return to X12. So the lab was abandoned. However, anecdotal evidence suggests that someone is still using the lab for their own purposes. There's no definitive confirmation of that. A couple of quads from the Duty clan went to it, but all members of the expedition were killed on the way out, which also raised quite a few questions and suspicions."
